page.title: 05Housing in Knypersley
page.content: The housing in the area is varied inform of either estates or lines follow main road. Terraced houses of the type found in Brindley Ford cater mainly for those in lower wage bracket. The larger privately owned detatched and semi-detatched houses in the Knypersley area are mainly occupied by higher wage earners. There is a large estate of Council own houses which were originally built for tenants such as the miners who were employed in the local colliery until its closure. A privately owned bungalow estate adjoins the Council estate.A number of bungalows are for the elderly and built in compact units to foster a community atmosphere. Considerable new housing is being built in the are extending estates.
